author: Jason Cox
description: This module installs Postgres Plus (EnterpiseDB) and allows for streaming replication to be creted
name: jlcox-postgresplus
summary: Installation and confgiuration of a Postgres Plus server with replication

properties.name: command
properties.doc: The SQL command to execute via psql.

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: An arbitrary tag for your own reference; the name of the message.

parameters.name: unless
parameters.doc: An optional SQL command to execute prior to the main :command; this is generally intended to be used for idempotency, to check for the existence of an object in the database to determine whether or not the main SQL command needs to be executed at all.

parameters.name: db
parameters.doc: The name of the database to execute the SQL command against.

parameters.name: search_path
parameters.doc: The schema search path to use when executing the SQL command

parameters.name: psql_user
parameters.doc: The system user account under which the psql command should be executed.

parameters.name: psql_group
parameters.doc: The system user group account under which the psql command should be executed.

parameters.name: cwd
parameters.doc: The working directory under which the psql command should be executed.

parameters.name: refreshonly
parameters.doc: If 'true', then the SQL will only be executed via a notify/subscribe event.

properties.name: value
properties.doc: The value to set for this parameter.

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The postgresql parameter name to manage.

types.name: postgresql_conf
types.doc: This type allows puppet to manage postgresql.conf parameters.
